title: (22520) Fraga - 3 Camino Sotet
description: Asphalt parking near the Pabellón del Sotet, is very spacious. It is next to the river where there is a green area to walk. The site is quiet and has garbage cans and containers.

title: (22520) Fraga - 18 Calle del Castillo
description: Large parking lot of the castle. Calm and illuminated. Children's play area. Fountain to carry water.

title: (22520) Fraga - 4 Avenida de los Deportes
description: Large parking shared with cars. without services.

title: (22520) Fraga - 7 Camino Ag
description: Dirt road that runs along the road on the river side. there are shaded parking spaces, and a nice shaded grassy area along the river with benches. very quiet place to spend the night.

title: (22520) Fraga - 39 Calle Jaime I
description:
Area asphalt together supermarket and laundry, no quiet night services.
Good place to sleep en route.

title: (22520) Fraga - 23 Paseo de la Constitución
description: Parking near sports facilities and next to the river, there is also an area with tables. the place is very quiet to spend the night a couple of nights. The bathrooms, shower and pool must be only in season, yesterday (09/13/21) there was nothing but drinking water, gray water discharge and black.

title: (22520) Fraga - 27 Calle Cabañera Real
description: Water fountain in front of the ElCampo supermarket

title: (22520) Fraga - 27 Partida Poligono 089
description: This truckstop has showers for 3 euro per person and it is really clean and neat, you have to ask for a key in the supermarket. You could sleep here for one night but I wouldn't reccomend as it is quite noisy. There is a restaurant with nice food although a little pricy

title: (22520) Fraga - A-1234
description: Charming little place by the river, to be reserved for 4X4s and Vans of contained template. We only made a stop for lunch, but you can spend the night there, it seems very quiet. Several low sides available along the way.

title: (22520) Fraga -
description: On a hill there is a large and straight parking space for up to two camper vans. The only ascent (N-211 opposite MercoFraga) is a very bumpy and demanding road, but it is possible without a 4x4. With our T5 it was no problem, motorhomes fail. Arrival and departure should only take place in dry weather. If you have made it, you will be rewarded with a wonderful view, great hiking opportunities and solitude in the midst of flower fields and lavender.

title: (22590) Torrente de Cinca - 8 Camino de San Salvador
title_short: (22590) Torrente de Cinca - 8 Camino de San Salvador
description: Monastery of San Salvador. A magical place to spend the night, and the monastery is magnificent, a must see Beware the climb is steep, our Hymer 599 climbed without problem. U-turn on the square at the top with caution

title: (22529) Miralsot - 93 Calle Magdalena
description: Public parking of the neighborhood swimming pools. The swimming pools are for public use, so they allow entry with a daily ticket in summer. You can do mountain bike and motorcycle rides as it has dirt paths. It is possible to spend the night, recommended for rest en route. In the town center there is a play area next to a bar.

title: (22520) Fraga - A-1234
description: Esplanade immense parking, restaurant Km  6.5, a few km from Fraga (Huesca). The owner offered us to spend the night and recommend it in our portals. Restaurant of 10 out of 10. Friendliness and excellent food. The parking is perfect for large AC, with entry during the day for trucks. Safe, closed and very comfortable enclosure. Without services, apart from the restaurant

title: (25184) Massalcoreig - 16 Carrer Major
description: The town hall has a free water point, and a grate for gray water

title: (22528) Velilla de Cinca -
description: Parking to spend the night quiet or eat at their picnic tables next to the hermitage museum of the hermit, there are several routes to climb the Monegros desert

title: (22590) Torrente de Cinca -
description: Rest area in AP-2 with picnic tables and litter bins, we have stopped to eat

title: (25182) Aitona - Carrer Sant Antoli
description:
Good place to stay overnight, quiet area in front of the football field, near AC area very close.
Visit the village of Aitona with a highly recommended guide.

title: (25182) Aitona - 27 LP-7041
description: Super nice and spacious CP where everything you need with the motorhome is available. The CP is quite new, but what a beautiful place and above all... What a view. Really beautiful seen from his trailer. The climb is quite steep, but that was no problem for our 8.5m. there is also a bar, hence the name of the bar. now there are 20 seats, but it can certainly be extended to 40 seats. A clean and easily accessible sanitary room is available. It's definitely a number one favorite.

title: (25182) Aitona - Carretera d'Aitona
description: Place to stop to eat and spend the day.

title: (22590) Torrente de Cinca - N-211
description: Quiet, shady place at the foot of the junction of the segre and cinca rivers. Room for 2 campers or motorhomes (1 in shade). The last meters are along the natural path of the segre, gravel and dirt, but perfectly passable.

title: (25181) Soses - Autovia A2 Km 447
description: Overnight area for motorhomes and campers open all year, 24 hours a day. Automatic opening via mobile. Strategically located between Barcelona and Madrid, being a link between the AP2 motorway and the A-2 motorway. Ideal point to spend the night, rest on the road or empty and fill waters. Integrated in the service area 447 of the A-2 motorway (exit 447), a few meters from a gas station and a cafeteria-restaurant, Camper El Globo Area is equipped with 10 parking spaces of 45 m2 (9m * 5m). All with electrical outlet. Possibility of pitches for larger vehicles.

title: (25185) La Granja d'Escarp - A-2414
description: Large free under the trees parking at the edge of the Cinca with water point, locked barbecue (???) and table. accessible to any vehicle. calm at night. busy road on the other side the day. pity that there is no trash, many rubbish on the picnic area.

title: (25185) La Granja d'Escarp - 97 Carrer Mequinensa
description: New service area for motorhomes in a natural environment and with access to various signposted itineraries. Free access and overnight stay. Max.48hrs.The electrical connection works with tokens that are sold in the bars of the town or the town hall (2Eur=12Hrs). Water service 30 minutes-1Eur. Located in the sports area next to the municipal swimming pools, picnic area and playground. The town has shops and bars. It is worth mentioning that there is a sign at the N211 turnoff indicating that there is no entry for vehicles over 5.5 tonnes. This sign can only be seen if you are driving from the south on the N211 towards Lleida.

title: (25185) La Granja d'Escarp - A-2414
description: Perfect place to sleep. It's really beautiful and quiet. If possible, do NOT drive through the village, it's really narrow! The place is slightly elevated and the driveway is steep. If you have concerns, drive 5 meters further and reverse up the exit. Right next door is a playground and alternative places. Electricity is only available with tokens, which are available in the village

title: (25185) La Granja d'Escarp - A-2414
description: Parking lot near the A-2414, which can be reached via a gravel path (only suitable for vans / small mobile homes. Space is right on the river and there are even public garbage cans.

title: (22529) Fraga - 12 Partida Poligono 059
description: Tranquil Site in the abandoned town of Cardiel, there is no one, day or night. We spent the night and everything was fine. Pretty wind, yes!

title: (25170) Torres de Segre - 13 Passeig del Segre
title_short: (25170) Torres de Segre - 13 Passeig del Segre
description: Free municipal parking, next to the Segre river in an area with picnic areas, municipal swimming pool and football field. Trucks prohibited. Perfect for spending a night in winter. Very calm town.

title: (25170) Torres de Segre - 13 Passeig del Segre
title_short: (25170) Torres de Segre - 13 Passeig del Segre
description: Parking on the Segre river promenade, quiet day and night, best transit option

title: (25182) Torres de Segre - 3 Avinguda Pearson
description: Not at all the ideal place. In the midst of mass plantations of fruit trees. Lock that goes off every 5 minutes. Not calm at all, I strongly advise against it. Good for a break or a barbecue. Attention the police control the fishermen. Corrigendum from walkman 74: just go to the other side of the road and behind the trees, there is a small quiet esplanade. A little dirt but far enough away from noise

title: (25170) Utxesa -
description: Area to park and spend the night next to the swamp. You can start routes by mountain bike and on foot to go around the entire perimeter of the Utxesa natural area. Place of great ornithological and landscape interest. Enjoy it with respect.

title: (25170) Torres de Segre - Passeig del Segre
title_short: (25170) Torres de Segre - Passeig del Segre
description: Torres de Segre, near the river and with good views, possibility of walking the green path that surrounds the Segre to Utxesa. Very quiet and nice town

title_short: (25170) Torres de Segre - 73D Avinguda Pau Casals

title: (25185) La Granja d'Escarp - Unnamed Road
description: Starting point to climb Montmeneu

title: (50170) Mequinenza -
description: This place is beautiful and magical! Perfect for fishing! There is a road nearby, but traffic is less at night. We got to see Elon Musk's Starlink satellites on our first night!

title: (25112) Gimenells - Carre Circumval-lacio
description: Motorhome pitch with free service. Access is directly at the pool car park through a gate in the fence. Not easy to find in the dark. A village in the middle of nowhere, only agriculture around. Unfortunately, the much-praised pool restaurant was already closed when we arrived. The pitch itself is very well maintained and is also used for local events, easily recognizable by the huge grill grate and stone tables.

title: (50170) Mequinenza - N-211
description: Very quiet place and frequented by fishermen. Next to the river. Wooded area with shade. Benches and fountain

title: (25180) Alcarràs - L-800
description: Guarded parking next to the hotel. Parking cost exchangeable for breakfast. Hotel services. It does not charge electricity or water. Gas station at 200 meters.

title: (25170) Torres de Segre - Unnamed Road
description: Parking in the Sanctuary of Carrassumada, very close to Torres de Segre. Quiet place without services. Perfect to spend a night if you go by the AP2.

title: (50170) Mequinenza - 75 Calle N
description: Nice place to spend the day and night. We slept at the level of the reservoir and we could hear the fish jumping in the water and the birds singing in the morning. Lots of mosquitoes in the water.

title: (50170) Mequinenza - 65 Calle N
description: Parking at the water's edge with playground for children. Municipal swimming pool. Perfect for a quick stopover.

title: (25183) Seròs - C-45
description: Place on dirt but flat. It only serves to sleep, nothing more.

name: Càmping Octogesa
title: (50170) Càmping Octogesa
description: Nice campsite where the river El Segre flows into the Rio Ebro. Campsite is located by the river at the end of the town between the main road behind the campground and the promenade. Campsite operator speaks German.

name: Knittels Ebro Angelcamp
title: (50170) Knittels Ebro Angelcamp
description: Angler campsite, German-speaking, with restaurant, located directly on the reservoir. Each pitch has its own electricity connection, a bit of shade. Clean toilets and showers. The town of Mequinenza can be reached on foot in 25 minutes. There are shops and restaurants there. Very friendly and helpful. You can rent fishing gear, boats, quads, motorbikes and e-bikes. The driveway to the pitches is quite steep.

title: (50170) Mequinenza - 10 Carretera Fraga
description:
Had a great couple of nights here, with my fishing rods, you need a licence from the fishing tackle shop just over the road.
no facilities but just up the road is a camp site with great shower's and a washing machine.

title: (22234) Ballobar -
description: Area in the middle of nature with several picnic table areas, several roofed decks, several drinking water fountains. Good place to sleep very calm and quiet (we went during the week) there is an outdoor gym area, and walking to the town is 10 minutes, the municipal swimming pool is 10 minutes walking. We were here for 2 days and no one said anything to us, even a girl from the town hall came to clean up there and she didn't tell us anything either, so I guess they shouldn't complain.

title: (25180) Alcarràs -
description: A little parking area next to an old historical building. There are bins bit nothing else. A great spot for a night away from the motorway.

title: (25170) Torres de Segre - Autopista del Nordeste
title_short: (25170) Torres de Segre - Autopista del Nordeste
description: Simple place, where to stop and set up tent. There is only a lack of toilets or access to water. But at night it may be

title: (22234) Ballobar - 4 Barranco G
description: Esplanade at the hermitage of San Juan batisto. Do not go through the old bridge and the village, calle fraga is too narrow. Go around the a131, take Autonomia Avenue. Follow the canal and at the end follow the yellow signs "disabled access". It is a dirt track but wide and in good condition. At one point, the GPS may make you turn right on a narrower track, but don't do it, it's better to go around. If in doubt, stay on the wide track and only turn when you see a yellow sign. Picnic tables upstairs. A priori nothing prohibits spending the night there.

title: (25173) Sudanell - 1 Carrer Ponent
description: Quiet parking next to the municipal swimming pool and a children's play area. Good night.

title: (50170) Mequinenza - Camino Camí de l'Albera

20 minutes from morzon. because the location is along water, there are also. the evening some insects come.

title: (50700) Caspe - Isla Magdalena
description: For the adventurous, far from everything, earthen promontory with superb view of the peninsula of Magdalena and its abandoned hermitage, access by VAN only, from the A230 through the 'pampas' by a good road then 10kms of dirt track (in the extension of the road at pt 41.33852 0.03155), some sections of track to be negotiated at the end, access only in dry weather, clayey terrain. Access is a bit laborious, you have been warned, do not come and complain. Beautiful walk on the island, swimming.

title: (25150) Artesa de Lleida - LV-7021
description: Picnic area of Artesa de Lleida. Tables and benches made of wood. Great space to park. Good starting point to visit "The Secans of Mas de Melons-Alfés".

title: (22232) Ontiñena -
description: A place at the end of the road to rest in the shade

title: (22410) Alcolea de Cinca -
description: Santa Cruz viewpoint. Spectacular views of the Cinca Valley and the Pyrenees in the background on clear days.

title: (25152) El Cogul - LV-7021
description: Very quiet place surrounded by fields and forest. Irregular access

title: (25163) El Soleràs -
description: Picnic area attached to a hermitage 5 minutes from the town of El Soleras. Clear nights with milky way. There is a drinking tap, although without a thread, next to the hermitage and rubbish. Some fox is usually seen at sunset / sunrise. No chairs or tables outside or awnings, only parking or overnight.

title: (22410) Alcolea de Cinca - 1A Camino Sardera
description: New area for motorhomes at the foot of the road, easily spotted. In the same urban area, a few meters from all services: restaurants, shops, low cost gas station, sports area with swimming pools and tennis courts, paddle tennis and rest area with playground. It remains to complete the conditioning and the paving but the bases are already functional. To clear the black water, you need to activate a black circular pedal that is on the floor.

title: (22410) Alcolea de Cinca -
description: Good for a good rest with a view and a picnic table. Just on the other side of the road is the path that leads to some fantastic viewpoints of the cliffs of Las Ripas. 5 min by motorhome. Dirt road.

title: (25152) El Cogul - Unnamed Road
description: Good place to spend a night

title: (25153) Puigverd de Lleida - AP-2
description: Great parking space for one night on the way to Barcelona. Right next to the highway, you can hardly hear the traffic passing by.

name: Camping Riba-roja
title: (43790) Camping Riba-roja
description: Ideal for Fishing

title: (43790) Riba-roja d'Ebre - 13 TV-7411
description: Nice and quiet place in private landscape close to water with showers,WC,laundry,kitchen,grill and limited amount of electricity (only sunny days).Possibility to borrow fishing gears,caravans,boots etc…

name: FAYON FISHING campsite
title: (50795) FAYON FISHING campsite
description: Municipal campsite with very quiet swimming pool for a month of July, ideal for anglers at the top, with washing machine available for free 25th the 3 first night but 20th if you stay longer

title: (50795) Fayón - Unnamed Road
description: Very nice view of the region. You can visit the hermitage and spend the night without any problem

title: (22540) Altorricón - Unnamed Road
description: Picnic area next to a hermitage. With lots of shade and tables. Flat surface and very quiet. With litter boxes, so please pick up the waste and leave the area clean and decent.

title: (43790) Riba-roja d'Ebre - 13 TV-7411
description: Picnic area with many tables, barbecues and shade. Paying fishing area. Good access with vans and medium motorhomes.

title: (50709) La Morera de Montsant - Unnamed Road
title_short: (50709) La Morera de Montsant - Unnamed Road
description: A very large paved parking with fantastic views of Ebro. 3km from the main road. Accessible for any type of vehicle/motorhome. Picnic area and ready-to-use BBQs. There is a small café and toilets but probably only open during holidays. Nice hiking. Area known to local fishermen.

title: () Alguaire - Camino de Tamarite de Litera a Alguaire
title_short: () Alguaire - Camino de Tamarite de Litera a Alguaire
description: The clot of the ring, a space full of life.

address.street: Camino de Tamarite de Litera a Alguaire

title: (43790) Riba-roja d'Ebre - TV-7411
description: BBQ and picnic space. Is also safe for a night. Extremely nice view.

title: (43790) Riba-roja d'Ebre - 5 TV-7411
description: Ribaroja de Ebro Yacht Club, spectacular, cozy place, with the possibility of renting a boat or bringing your own. You have water filling and emptying services at the entrance of the town.

title: (25177) La Granadella -
description: Big ac You can spend the night, paved road.

title: (25178) Bovera - Carrer de l'Esport
description: Àrea molt tranquil.la in a small village in the region of les Garrigues, with drinkable water services and free gray, picnic area.

name: Camping Port Massaluca
title: (43783) Camping Port Massaluca
description: Camping PortMassaluca. Fantastic views, facilities are absolutely good, restaurant on the site and highly recommended, for fishermen a dream! We stayed here in November and it was very quiet and still relatively warm! Everyone is super nice even if you do not speak Spanish :)! I enjoyed being here!

title: (43783) La Pobla de Massaluca - 27 TV-7231
description: Quiet place to spend a night without problems and do various activities such as fishing, hiking or swimming in the lake.

name: Wels-Camp Matarraña SL.
title: (50795) Wels-Camp Matarraña SL.
description: Next to the river, close to nature. With the possibility of wifi, shower, toilets, electricity, etc ...

title: (43790) Riba-roja d'Ebre - 31 Extrarradio Vivendes Enher
description: Area for motorhomes

title: (25195) Alcoletge - E-25
description: Arrived late after struggling to find somewhere suitable. Spent the night parked up with lorrys- no problems!

title: (25137) Corbins - N12 Comarcal
description: Gas station with two stations to empty gray water.

title: (22535) Esplús - km 128 N-240
description:
AGROPIENSO is an important cooperative in the area with a gas station service at a good price and an excellent cafeteria with a store that has numerous products from the area such as pastries, cheeses, oils...
No space or height problems.

title: (25154) Castelldans -
description: Super quiet place in the parking lot of the Hermitage of the Mare de deu de Montserrat. Accessible via a very well passable path. Lots of picnic tables. The village is 5 minutes walk away.

title: (43750) Flix - Unnamed Road
description: In the Sebes nature reserve, 2 Picnic tables with shade, some parking spaces. Some hiking trails, it is also a bird watching area.

title: (25137) Corbins - 6 Plaça de la Carnisseria
description: Picnic area, duck lake and RV park. Driving down to the lake is no longer possible, but we slept peacefully at the top. The bells of the church are not a problem !!

name: Camping Lake Caspe
title: (50700) Camping Lake Caspe
description: Caspe, km286 N-211. Campsite with swimming pool, very friendly, beach, fishing, has a barbecue area with well shaded seats. Everything is super super clean, useful for relaxing.

title: (22231) Villanueva de Sigena - Unnamed Road
description: Piedrafita refuge, great view, access only by track. A bit of passage but very pleasant. Refuge closed but possibility of camping nearby.

title: (43750) Flix - C-233
description: Small quiet corner ideal for spending a night below the road but not busy at night. no service. there is a small recess at the bottom for small vehicles such as T4. there is a nice little walk down a stone quarry along the river

title: (50794) Nonaspe - Camí del Sol de L'Horta
title_short: (50794) Nonaspe - Camí del Sol de L'Horta
description: Stop at Nonaspe. Green area with swings next to the junction of two rivers. Several barbecue areas, swings and fountain. Areas of shade and sun. There are bathrooms but I think normally they are closed.

title: (25430) Juneda - 555 Diseminado Poligon 5
description: Area for motorhomes and other types of vehicles. It is part of the park and school farm La Manreana. Equipped with drinking water, sewage disposal and recycling containers. To visit the park and information, the hours are from 11:00 a.m. to 7:00 p.m.

title: (25135) La Portella - Unnamed Road
description: Parque del Río Noguera Ribagorzana, an oasis in the middle of the hot plain. It is not a total 4X4 area, it can be accessed even with cars, but I do not recommend it for large volume motorhomes. Very quiet place, in summer it is better to bring protection for mosquitoes.

title: (22500) Binéfar - 117A Calle Almacellas
description: Parking next to the Punto Estrella Restaurant where you can eat quite well.

title: (43750) Flix - 19 Carrer dels Tallers
description: Free ac area with all services, it has a paid toilet, 50 cents, it has electricity but I do not know if it works with coins or with some type of token, we do not use it nor is there any information about it, otherwise a pleasant place despite being on the side of the road. Supermarket and restaurant very close

title: (22510) Binaced - A-2220
description: Parking of an old Roman road, not indicated. A dozen meters in a dented road, avoid in rainy weather. Nice view, gigantic fields of fruit all around ...

title: (43750) Flix - Carrer Misericòrdia
description: Quite place up the hill nearbij the castle. Great view over Flix and the Elbru.

title: (50700) Caspe - N-211
description: On the Rio Ebro.

title: (22500) Binéfar - 112 Calle Almacellas
description: Self-service laundry at the same Repsol gas station, next to the Mercadona.

title: (50700) Caspe -
description: Quiet place on the shores of the Sea of Aragon, you can fish or rest, you can not camp or spend the night. The road is dirt but we arrived without problems in a 7-meter motorhome.

title: (25126) Almenar - 62 Carrer Espadós
description: Place to park and sleep! Quiet and spacious!

title: (43750) Flix - 29 Avinguda President Companys
description: Parking, very central, within an island of houses but public, with official signage of the town hall. There is night lighting. We have only used it during the day.

title: (22510) Binaced - 17 Partida Poligono 31
description: Good for emptying and filling the motorhome, the black water cover is heavy

title: (22511) Valcarca - Unnamed Road
description: Area of shady pines and with 4 signposted places (plus many others without signposting) to park at the San Quilez viewpoint, near the hermitage with the same name, near the town of Binefar, which has supermarkets and all services , and also near the A22 that connects Lleida and Huesca. It has picnic tables, garbage cans and containers and "non-potable" water. It also has a children's park and a couple of hundred meters before there is an area with dogs. From here begins the "Geodesic Point Trail". It is worth taking a look at the viewpoint and seeing the Pyrenees and approaching the hermitage. The place is quiet, whenever I come there is no one there, I hear a distant murmur from the highway and from some factory, but it doesn't bother me to sleep.

title: (43750) Flix - 7 Passeig de l'Ebre
description: Quiet place on the other side of the ferry Flix for alte meal, the ferry does not take the motorhomes, you must go around Flix from the outside looking at maps you understand. WARNING, do not spend the night risk of overflow.

title: (25126) Alfarràs - Unnamed Road
description: In the middle of nature, with a lot of shade. There is a small stream to soak in and a 3 minute walk down the river. The path to access is a bit complicated. Difficult for motorhomes, although little by little and you can get there.

title: (43370) La Palma d'Ebre - T-703
description: In the heart of nature with a superb view of the reservoir - Palma d'Ebre dam - calm assured - left side of the dam. wc closed today. No parking ban. Access indicated by the village. Narrow road for 700 m. The other point must be made by another access selble t he.

title: (25690) Vilanova de la Barca - 1 Carrer la Font
title_short: (25690) Vilanova de la Barca - 1 Carrer la Font
description: Asphalt parking with a dirt area, very large, without shadows, next to a soccer field and a children's bike track, very quiet day and night.

title: (25126) Almenar -
description: Place along a small gravel path between the fields, at an abandoned shed. Total tranquility and beautiful panorama. View of the Pyrenees in the distance. No shade, but that wasn't a problem now, in October. Just nature sounds. Fragrance of wild thym. Between 6 p.m. and 12 noon the following afternoon, no one was seen or heard. Very clean. Keep it that way! Reasonably accessible via a forest road with some potholes, but doable without a 4x4.

title: (43370) La Palma d'Ebre - 27 T-702
description: Recreational area next to the reservoir with some shade and picnic areas.

title: (25220) Bell-lloc d'Urgell - Unnamed Road
description: Parking with views of Bell-lloc and the flat (on a good day you can see the Pyrenees perfectly), 50 meters from the municipal pine forest, where there are barbecues and large tables. There are garbage containers.

title: (22558) Albelda - 92 Partida Bassella
description: Quiet, allowed and incredibly at least today without mosquitoes.

title: (22231) Villanueva de Sigena - Calle San Blas
title_short: (22231) Villanueva de Sigena - Calle San Blas
description: Quiet place located at the top of Villanueva de Sigena, perfect for spending the night and visiting the Sigena monastery and the Miguel Servet museum. Check schedules. Access to the sports center to play soccer, basketball and fronton and to the swimming pools in summer. Wood oven bakery with the best muffins I've ever had!

title: (22500) Binéfar - 72 Diseminado Afueras
description: Ample paved parking without services. Right in front of a municipal park where there are picnic tables to eat and drinking water fountains. Public toilets in the park and in the sports center right next to it

title: (22500) Binéfar - 11 Partida Segalar
description: Gas station / service station, with fuel at a good price, small shop and various services.

title: (25220) Bell-lloc d'Urgell - 7 Carrer Estació
description: Very peaceful place, maybe a little isolated, I spent two dream nights

title: (22550) Tamarite de Litera - 3 Camino Piscinas / Junto Polideportivo
title_short: (22550) Tamarite de Litera - 3 Camino Piscinas / Junto Polideportivo
description: Very calm and well signposted. Good option to sleep it between Lleida and Huesca.

title: (22558) Albelda - 1 Diseminado la Sabina
description: Wooded picnic area, tables, benches and fountain.

title: (25177) Bellaguarda - C-242
description: Old soccer field, perfect for sleeping. Without services Road little traveled.

title: (25120) Alfarràs - 44 Avinguda de Balmes
description: Bon punt de rests on the Lleida-la Vall d'Aran route, N-230, deviating a few meters towards Balaguer, on the C-26 road. Parking located on the coast of the Noguera Ribagorçana, with the possibility of being able to go down to the river for fishing or fishing. Al costat d'un col.legi but the area is molt ample. 100 meters from the center of the town, both serveis.

title: (50700) Caspe - Camino de la Herradura
description: Super quiet to spend the night. Dirt track not for large motorhomes

title: (25430) Juneda - 6 Carrer del Canal d'Urgell
description: Juneda sports area car park, right next to the Urgell canal. Quiet and perfect place to spend a night, make excursions by bike or on foot along the canal and a short visit to the town with a medieval past.

title: (22223) Valfarta - 12 Extramuros
description: Car wash does not spend the night or empty grays, the photo does not correspond to the place.

name: Camping La Estepa
title: (22223) Camping La Estepa
description: New owner of the campsite. He comes when called. The phone number is in the common room. pool, shower, toilet. Motorhomes 7 x 3 meters without problems. WLAN only free in the restaurant. The owner is very friendly. There is also a restaurant 5 minutes walk from the square. Same owner

title: (25130) Algerri - 11 Cami Rubinals
description: Diner next to the road. Services are only open when the pool is open
